      • paintPlot

        public void paintPlot(Graphics2D g2d,
                      boolean fromGUI,
                      Qsim qsim)
        Paints the frontier (and any auxiliary data) on a specified Graphics2D object.
        Parameters:
        fromGUI - This value should be true if feedback (user's ability to click on nodes etc.) should be enabled, as opposed to simply producing a PNG/SVG image file.

      • getRecommendedDim

        public Dimension getRecommendedDim()

      • setRecommendedDim

        public void setRecommendedDim(Dimension d)

      • drawGrid

        protected static AffineTransform drawGrid(Graphics2D g2d,
                                          Dimension bounds,
                                          double realWidth,
                                          double realHeight,
                                          String title,
                                          boolean web)
        Draws a suitably spaced grid for the argument range [0:realWidth] x [0:realHeight]
        Parameters:
        g2d - this is where we draw
        realWidth - the range of time to display on the plot
        realHeight - the range of the crowd size to display on the plot
        Returns:
        the AffineTransform object which can be later use to convert the positions of individual plot points to the screen coordinates
